price: Ìgbádùn díẹ̀ (lè wà fún wọn), lẹ́yìn náà iná Jahanamọ ni ibùgbé wọn. Ibùgbé náà sì burú.
arabic: مَتَٰعٞ قَلِيلٞ ثُمَّ مَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: matāʿun qalīlun thumma mawāhum jahannamu wabi'sa al-mihādu
